column5: Our house is set within a gated community, the house is new clean tidy and fresh. We have a dog but during the day the dog is with me at work. She is a lovely dog no problems and loves everyone. I work 8-10 hours a day and am only home at night. We have TV, Internet and a lovely room for you to make your own. Access to the gym and pool are available also. You will get a gate key for access in and out of the facility.
